title: Zillow
description:
Objective: We can connect our Discord channel with any spreadsheet. Whenever an individual updates their project working status, an automatic notification is sent to Discord in real time. This can also be applied to other workflows like leave management or task updates.
Expected Result: Team members can stay updated on project progress and task changes. The data can be used to generate summary boards in another Discord channel, with detailed monthly reports that can also be generated automatically.
